items.name: Fender Standard Telecaster
items.descripton: Pure and simple, this instrument features classic Fender tone styling that evokes and honors the timeless Fender mainstays that came before it and contributed crucial DNA.
Achieve the classic iconic tones that only a Fender Stratocaster with three single-coil pickups can provide
